mapper.select: /* selectPositionList */ SELECT A.POSITION_SN , A.POSITION_DESC , A.POSITION_REQUIRE , (SELECT FILE_USER_NM FROM TB_FILE F WHERE F.FILE_DATA_SN = A.POSITION_SN AND F.USE_STATE = 'Y' AND F.FILE_CONTENT_CD = 'main') AS FILE_USER_NM_MAIN , (SELECT FILE_PATH FROM TB_FILE F WHERE F.FILE_DATA_SN = A.POSITION_SN AND F.USE_STATE = 'Y' AND F.FILE_CONTENT_CD = 'main') AS FILE_PATH_MAIN , C.CODE_NM AS POSITION_CAT_NM FROM TB_CAREER_POSITION A INNER JOIN TB_ADM B ON (B.ADM_SN = A.REG_SN) INNER JOIN TB_CODE C ON (C.CODE_ID = A.POSITION_CAT) WHERE A.USE_STATE = 'Y' AND A.DISPLAY_YN = 'Y' AND B.USE_STATE = 'Y' AND A.POSITION_ID = #{position_id} ORDER BY A.POSITION_SN DESC
